The CHIMPS gimmick has allowed Congress to spend non-taxpayer, non-general fund dollars on unrelated programs at the expense of victims of crime.  Zeroing out CHIMPS would ensure proper use of the Crime Victims Fund such that funds go directly to the victims of crime.

At today's @BudgetGOP markup of the Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Resolution, I expressed support for zeroing out Changes in Mandatory Programs (CHIMPS).  https://www.crapo.senate.gov/media/newsreleases/crapo-expresses-support-for-crime-victims-fund-zeroing-out-changes-in-mandatory-programs …
